pkgmetadata.longdescription: Parsimonious Gaussian Mixture Models // Carries out model-based clustering or classification using parsimonious Gaussian mixture models. McNicholas and Murphy (2008) doi:10.1007/s11222-008-9056-0, McNicholas (2010) doi:10.1016/j.jspi.2009.11.006, McNicholas and Murphy (2010) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btq498.
